name: Yes Boss
description:
The theme was ‘Mr. Secretary’, the rule was co-op and our team took it upon ourselves to create the best shooter possible! (because that’s the first thing that comes to mind when you think of a secretary)

Complete your work by shooting it with a pen. Send more work to your colleagues by shutting down your pipes. With your spare time, do extra work for your boss, like shooting him with a pen.

Made using 3DS Max, Substance Painter, Photoshop and Unity.
